channel.title: Have a moparisthebest server<----------- please don't flame
channel.description: This sounds ridiculous but I was thinking maybe we could have a moparisthebest.com private server?Every one can contribute code as long as they have a certain amount of rep-5 maybe?The thing of course is open source so no one would accuse another person of ripping another persons work,but maybe you would have to put your name to the code for recognition purposes.There could even be a cup for this stuff. What do you guys think?

item.title: Have a moparisthebest server<----------- please don't flame
item.dc:creator: @the_one1 the one
item.description:
@the_one1 wrote:

Sorry,forgot this post existed…
I would like to work on hybridscape but,I’m not very interested in private servers much now.More of the real deal…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @MrWicked MrWicked
item.description:
@MrWicked wrote:

Ive seen this attempt a view times, always fucks up lol, and Drunkenoldma I dont think its quite 80%

Top 5 Boards are Basically all Private server related.

Top 10 Topics by replies are all Private server related.

and

Top 10 Topics by views are all Private server related.

So I think alot of this forum is for people who enjoy private servers.
